help.title: Help Menu
help.text: Click the title of the course to return to the beginning of the course.
This is the navigation, and your main means of getting around the course. The main categories are at the top, and the sub-categories listed below. Each section gets checked off as you visit it.
This is the progress bar. It gradually increases as you go through the course, helping you to keep track of your overall progress.

assessment.title: Assessment
assessment.text:
Are you sure you want to exit this learning module?

We encourage you to explore this module thoroughly, revisiting those areas that may require a deeper understanding for you. The more you know, the more results you'll see on the sales floor! You can choose to exit to the assessment at any time.

page.title: Introduction
page.name: s1p1
page.sublaser: The Part to Look For Is the Part You Can't See.
page.body:
Smooth media streaming, fast downloads, speedy camera performance and responsive gaming - a smartphone’s speed and performance has a lot to do with the built-in processor.

In this training you’ll learn about Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ processors and how they make smartphones fast and power-efficient.

page.title: The Role of the Mobile Processor
page.name: s1p2
page.laserbeam: The Role of the Mobile Processor
page.body: Every smartphone has a processor. It affects things like:
page.text:
• Fast internet connection
  • Speed in executing commands
  • Responsive graphics
  • Battery efficiency
Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ processors are designed to deliver speed, performance and exceptional battery life.

page.title: PC Power. Smartphone Size.
page.name: s1p3
page.body: Snapdragon processors pack innovative technology into a small package for today’s mobile devices. Snapdragon processors designed to deliver power and performance for today’s demanding mobile experiences.
page.text: Snapdragon processors are intelligently designed to pack loads of power into a tiny chip.

page.title: Custom-built for mobile performance.
page.name: s1p4
page.body: Each Snapdragon processor is made up of specialized engines on one chip. The engines efficiently work together:
page.text:
• High speed performance
  • Fast, responsive graphics
  • Crystal clear audio
  • Fast downloads, uploads and navigation
  • Smooth video and clear audio
  • Battery life

Snapdragon processors combine multiple engines on a single chip. This “system on a chip” (SoC) is custom designed by Qualcomm to deliver the power you need, when you need it. Snapdragon processors make smartphones super-fast and power-efficient.

page.title: Summary
page.name: s3p1
page.body: Qualcomm Snapdragon processors are custom built specifically for mobile. This integrated design keeps the parts of the processor working smart, not hard, using the right part of the processor for the task you demand at the time. The result? Unbeatable performance and power-efficiency.
page.text: Customers can be confident that a smartphone with a Snapdragon processor will be fast, responsive and have exceptional battery life.

page.title: Congratulations
page.name: s3p2
page.body: You’ve completed the training on Qualcomm Snapdragon processors. Remember – the integration story is what makes Snapdragon processors unique. The parts of the processor are designed to seamlessly work together, providing a powerful mobile experience with great battery life.
